sql_mapping.insert: insert into mu_user_user_type (user_id, user_type_id, created_date, modified_date) values (#user_id#, #user_type_id#, '#created_date#', '#modified_date#')
sql_mapping.update: update mu_user_user_type set user_id=#new_user_id#, user_type_id=#new_user_type_id#, modified_date='#modified_date#' where user_id=#old_user_id# and user_type_id=#old_user_type_id#
sql_mapping.delete: delete from mu_user_user_type where user_id=#user_id# and user_type_id=#user_type_id#
sql_mapping.select: select * from mu_user_user_type uut where uut.user_id=#user_id# and uut.user_type_id=#user_type_id#
select count(*) total from mu_user_user_type where #conditions#
